properties.areaDesc: Greenville, SC; Pickens, SC; Spartanburg, SC; Laurens, SC; Anderson, SC
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 8:29PM EST until January 11 at 9:30PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northwestern Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina...
Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina...
Western Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina...
Anderson County in Upstate South Carolina...
Southeastern Pickens County in Upstate South Carolina...

* Until 930 PM EST.

* At 828 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Greenville Downtown to near Anderson, moving
northeast at 45 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines.

* Locations impacted include...
Greenville Downtown, Anderson, Easley, Greenville Eastside, West
Greenville, Greer, Mauldin, Taylors, Simpsonville and Berea.
properties.instruction:
Conditions are favorable for the development of brief, weak
tornadoes. Seek shelter inside an interior room.

Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National
Weather Service Greenville-Spartanburg by calling toll free, 1, 800,
2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using
hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the
specific location where it occurred.
